title: Edinburgh, the 19. day of July, 1665. Forsameikle, as the provost, bailies, and council of this Burgh, taking to their consideration the proclamation ... prohibiting and discharging all trade and commerce betwixt this kingdom ... and places of the kingdome of England which are infected or suspected to be infected wth the sicknesse, or plague of pestilence...
author: Edinburgh (Scotland). Town Council.
publisher: Printed by a Society of Stationers,
